resources.string: This is a very secret string that should be shown only on max authentification level
This is a secret string that should be shown only on max and mid authentification level
This is a normal string that should always be shown

Welcome 007.
 This is your personal log-in app that does everything you wish (or not).
 To log into medium clearance please enter your log in informations and click the button.
 To log into maximum clearence please enter your log in informations and swipe your personnal NFC tag.
 To read any barcode (1D or 2D) click on the corresponding button.
 Have a nice day !
